profile.name: Autopia
profile.motto: Vincit Qui Patitur (He Who Endures, Wins... usually the race)

geography.summary: A terra-formed diverse biome island designed specifically for automotive testing and lifestyle. The island is ringed by 'The Beltway' (Highway 1) and divided into 5 distinct 'Driving Zones'.

regions.name: Port Injection
regions.description: The capital city. A neon-drenched coastal metropolis where zoning laws require every building to have a garage on the first floor. Traffic lights are drag trees. The police drive high-speed interceptors (GTRs/Porsches).
landmarks: The Turbo Terminal (Shipping docks for vehicle imports)
The Spiral (A massive multi-level parking structure/residential complex)

regions.name: The Gasket Gulch
regions.description: The lawless interior. No paved roads exist here. Fuel is currency. The inhabitants live in fortified scrapyards. It is the graveyard for cars that fail inspection in the city.
landmarks: Injector Falls (An oasis, but for fuel refining)

regions.name: Apex Peaks
regions.description: A winding mountain range that separates the coast from the desert. Home to the wealthy and the skilled. The roads are technical, narrow, and often icy. 'The Pass' is the only paved route through the mountains.
landmarks: The Hairpin Hotel (Luxury resort at the summit)

regions.name: Torque Timberlands
regions.description: A dense, wet forest region. Travel here is measured in 'obstacles per mile' rather than MPH. The culture is cooperative; drivers must use winches and recovery gear to help each other traverse the terrain.
landmarks: The Bog (An infamous mud pit that swallows cars)

regions.name: Velocity Flats
regions.description: A massive, flat expanse of white salt. There are no speed limits because there are no lanes. This is the testing ground for experimental engineering and land speed records.
landmarks: Crash Site Alpha (A monument to failed attempts)

roads.Highway 1 (The Beltway): A 12-lane superhighway orbiting the island. 6 lanes clockwise, 6 lanes counter-clockwise. Minimum speed limit: 80 MPH.
roads.Route 666 (The Dragon): The mountain pass connecting Port Injection to The Gasket Gulch. 300 corners in 30 miles.
roads.The Overland Trail: A GPS-marked dirt route connecting the Timberlands to the Desert.

services.Fuel: Available everywhere. 100 Octane is standard. 87 Octane is illegal.
services.Repair: Every town center is a mechanic shop. Restaurants usually double as oil-change pits.

lawEnforcement.Off-Road Response: Ford Raptors & Local Motors Rally Fighters.
lawEnforcement.Philosophy: They don't pull you over for speeding; they pull you over for driving a boring car.

socialHierarchy: The Fabricators (Top tier - those who build)
The Tuners (Middle tier - those who improve)
The Drivers (Working class - those who operate)
The Commuters (Lowest class - those who drive purely for transport)

AutopiaCanon.coreLaw: All vehicles are manufactured on The Mainland. Autopia only drives, worships, modifies, and wages war over them.
AutopiaCanon.mainlandMyth: A fog-shrouded super-continent of endless factories that no Autopian has ever seen and returned unchanged.

dynasties.culturalRole: Honest daily drivers. The backbone of delivery fleets and family garages.
